title: Sestamibi as an alternative to mebrofenin for the diagnosis of acute cholecystitis: An alternative option during supply chain disruption
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Bamidele Otemuyiwa, Matthew S. Davenport, Daniel J. Wale, Midhhath Afza Munavar Ali, Benjamin L. Viglianti
